caption: Draw list of polygons
doc: Loads polygons based on data on bubble database with the coordinates in the order ""latitude - longitude"]

AIr.caption: Thing type
AIr.doc: type of data in bubble  that are used to load Longitude and latitude to render polygons.
AIr.name: thing_type

AIt.caption: Data source
AIt.doc: Origin of the data that will be used on polygon redering
AIt.name: data_source

AIu.caption: Latitude
AIu.doc: The list of latitudes that will compose the polygon
AIu.name: latitude

AIv.caption: Longitude
AIv.doc: The list of Longitudes that will compose the polygon
AIv.name: longitude

AIw.caption: Unique name
AIw.doc: A unique name to identify the elements of a polygon set
AIw.name: polygon_class_name
